title: Earth Rangers
description: Hi kids, if you think that animals are amazing, this is the show for you! Join host Earth Ranger Emma as she travels the world to discover the wildest animal facts out there and solve nature’s biggest mysteries. With top ten countdowns, an animal guessing game, conservation conversations, and epic animal showdowns, this is a journey you won’t want to miss! To learn more, visit earthrangers.com/podcast Produced in partnership with Gen-Z Media. For more great Gen-Z podcasts visit: http://gzmshows.com

episodes.title: Polar Bear Fur, and Birds With Flippers
Big-Eared Bats and Big Cat Countdown
Black Bears, and Winter Survival Skills
Eagles vs. Falcons, and Powerful Pollinators
Migrating Monarchs and Hare Camouflage
Wild Wetlands and Mighty Metamorphosizing Frogs
The World's Funniest Animals
The story of the most peculiar Beluga
Emma and the bird who eats… snakes?
Mysterious African Animals and a Surprisingly Chirpy Cheetah
Snoozing Sharks and Amazing Animal Superpowers
Head-Hiding Ostriches and Remote-Controlled Robot Birds
Understanding "Elephant Speak" and the Animal that sounds like a... Chain Saw?
Deep Sea Adventures and the World's Biggest Animals
Marvelous Marsupials and Australia’s Wildest Creatures
Hovering Hummingbirds and the World’s Most Extreme Animals!
The Lone Ranger Rides Again!
The Wolverine: Smelly Wilderness Grouch or Tenacious Super Weasel?
Sleek, Tubular and Incredibly Adorable - Meet: the River Otter
What Does the Arctic Fox Say?
The Big Melt - We love the North
Biodi-what?!-sity and an Enchanting Underwater Encounter
The dark, dark forest (which is actually really nice)
The Search for the Big Bad Wolf
James Bond of Birds - or the Penguin of the North
Steam-Blasting Beetles and other Animals with Chemical Superpowers
Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal - A Surprising Discovery!
Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal - Into the Jungle!
Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal - The Mystery of the Avian Guides
Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal - Sloth Bears at Dusk
Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal - Into the Clouds
Interlude - Junior Wildlife Reporters
Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal: Snow Leopards
episodes.description: Emma’s world-wide quest for the legendary wildlife conservationist Adelia Goodwin takes her to new heights: Into the realm of the snow leopard.

episodes.title: Interlude: Orcas, Narwhals and Bats
episodes.description: While Earth Ranger Emma is off adventuring in the Himalayas, her colleague Lucas takes over the podcasting station to give us an update on the latest Junior Wildlife Reports.

episodes.title: Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal - A Test of Knowledge
episodes.description: In this exciting episode Emma gets challenged to prove that she is who she says she is, by a participating in a test of animal trivia questions. Should be easy, right?

episodes.title: Adelia Goodwin's Secret Journal - Polar Bears in the Himalayas
episodes.description: Emma’s search for the missing conservationist Adelia Goodwin continues. Now with the help of Dr. Juliette Giri - Adelia's former research partner and a snow leopard expert. While hiking in the Himalayas, Emma finds out why there are no polar bears there, and discovers the next lead in her quest.
